message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget, the value of this product is significantly higher. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'd be willing to go up to $16,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
